text: @realDonaldTrump Bone spurs, pussy grabbing, good people on both sides, prostitute payoffs, pro quo, denying rentals to black people, birtherism, nuking a tornado, coronavirus deaths,  firing of people that speak out against you,  impeachment, Russia! Who disrespects this country more?
